entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.8°C

entry.title: Friday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning this evening. A few wet flurries over higher terrain before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. A few wet flurries over higher terrain in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm over higher terrain. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023
